description: Enterprise techniques used by MailSniper, ATT&CK software S0413 v1.0
name: MailSniper (S0413)

techniques.comment: MailSniper can be used to obtain account names from Exchange and Office 365 using the Get-GlobalAddressList cmdlet.[2]
MailSniper can be used for password spraying against Exchange and Office 365.[1]
MailSniper can be used for searching through email in Exchange and Office 365 environments.[1]
